title: How to start profitable news blog - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, I run a profitable news blog in CapeTown, South Africa. It is profitable but I did not get there overnight. In my first year, I made a total of about USD13. It looks scary, Isn't it? I started making good money during my second year and from my own experience, the following are steps I took: I started the news blog out of passion, not from the angle of making money, So I was not really worried about the money-making potential. So, make sure you are starting with genuine passion or else, you will get frustrated.I was consistent with my posts i.e I was publishing at least 3–6 articles every dayI focused on building strong social media followers, especially from Twitter. Facebook is good, but, trust me, twitter is good and reliable if you are looking to get outbound links of traffic back to your news blog or posts/storiesI had to build a strong SEO ( I built dofollow backlinks for my blog) before I even launched. This is to make sure I have a strong DA ( domain authority) so that my posts and stories can rank high on Google SERP because of organic traffic.During that one year, I was also building my email subscription list. So at the end of the year, I had almost 11,000 email subscribersOn some occasions, I use to pay for Facebook Ad for any viral or promising posts/news that has the tendency to go viral and bring lots of traffic. I usually study a new post that gets lots of traffic after 5–6 hours of publishing it. So, I leverage and try to push/increase traffic using Facebook Ads. I usually spend USD5 for a day or two.Do not copy and paste; try and write original contents/news and storiesUse social media aggressively to get traffic.For you to start a successful and profitable news blog, please, invest in social media marketing.

Hey there, If you are just planning to start a blog then forget about profit in the initial stage of your blog. Initially just try to increase the visitors. Once you have a good amount of traffic then you can start earn by affiliate marketing. In the initial stage try below steps to get a good amount of traffic. As you are in planning to build a news blog make sure that you are providing a correct things. The first and most important way to increase traffic is Publish more Article.Start a mail list and send emails to them. Email Marketing is really a powerful medium for generating a traffic.Guest Post: Start to write on other blog that are more popular than your blog.Optimize your blog for Search Engine. Never ignore SEO. Make your blog SEO friendly.Comment on other’s blog as well your own blog. Never ignore the comments on your post. Reply your visitors . So that you can build a relationship with them.Add social sharing icons on your post.Design of your blog should be Professional.No one like to see a Still Loading . Make your blog load faster.Choose a right theme for your blog.Hope this helps Regards Samir Kaila London Web Design Development Agency - w3nuts

I will endorse what Kunle has written here. News is not an easy niche for blogging. Not now because thousands of websites, established blogs and social entities are after news day and night. They have big resources and apps. To compete with the existing news entities, your blog has to serve something UNIQUE. This might include: Local news that other media are likely to ignore.A new insight into news on which there are different views.Liveblogging on developing stories, with useful links and alerts.News in a narrow niche - and then concentrating it like a possessed journalist. The niche could be within general news category or relating to a specific broad area such as fashion, travel, environment.
